metadata.name: VOLTZ KeySword #2
metadata.description: VOLTZ KeySword is an ultra rare Oracle Guide weapon and Rarity-Booster created by the Core Neural Obelisk. Utilities: burning 1 KeySword you can upgrade 1 StarShip (Rover to Fighter, or Fighter to MotherShip); burning 1 KeySword you can equip (Rarity-Boost) your VOLTZ StarShip with legendary space craft weaponry; the KeySword is an in-game weapon for any of your avatars; further utilities: TBA
